Name: Carma
About the game: Out drive your friends in fast, arcade-style vehicle combat, using power-ups, killstreaks, and the environment to smash your foes! Battle across a miniature world, avoiding dangers and earning the gods favour to level up and unlock a wide range of customisables to help you stand out from the crowd. Discover a diverse set of themed customisations for you to unlock through earning XP and favour from the gods of the universe. Spend favour on Toolboxes and test your luck to see what customisations you will hit the planets with. Fast paced hectic combat awaits in Carma. Use a wide variety of offensive and defensive powerups to defeat your opponents and build up a killstreak. Hit kill milestones and unleash hectic killstreaks upon the game to twist the odds in your favour. Take the fight to an extraordinary environment crafted by the gods. Bright popping colours and candied obstacles scattered across the planet can be used to your advantage, with routes handcrafted to allow you to dash around the planet quickly and make narrow escapes from danger.
